title: Chinese Cabbage and Pork Stir Fry
ingredients: ['Marinade', '1/2 tablespoon sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon light soy sauce or 1 tablespoon dark soy sauce', '1-2 tablespoons cornflour, mixed with 1 tablespoon water', '1 tablespoon oil', '225g pork, thinly sliced', '1 tablespoon oil', '1 head cabbage, finely sliced', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '6-8 dried shrimp, soaked', '250ml hot water']
